title: How to watch the Worlds Play-In stage

replies.body:
>If Dire Wolves manage do get the best their opponents,

i had to double take that sentence

Thanks, this is very helpful for clock challenged people like me.

But..
"If Dire Wolves do best their opponents,"
"If Dire Wolves manage to get the best of their opponents,"

Pick one, not both :P
(That's 5 more "being a dick" points for me, I'm nearly at my weekly quota.)
